faq.question: Hello
faq.answer: Hi, how can I help you?

faq.question: What can you do?
faq.answer: I can answer questions about our chocolate products and services.

faq.question: Can I customize chocolates?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer full customization including names, messages, and photos.

faq.question: What is the delivery time?
faq.answer: We typically deliver within 3-5 business days.

faq.question: Are your chocolates vegetarian?
faq.answer: Yes, all our chocolates are 100% vegetarian.
